features: 🎮 Newest Upgraded Version - CULAGEiMi upgraded handheld game consoles has 3.0 inch clearer screen and crystal clear speaker sound for better game visuals. Compact and lightweight console make kids easy to use and easy to carry, which will fit comfortably in kids' hands with ergonomic design. It gives children a happy experience of playing arcade games.

🎮 270 Classic Games - Featuring 270 fun kids video games, this handheld gaming player includes many classic games for entertainment, sports, adventure and more. As they play, they work on important developmental skills such as hand-eye coordination, thinking, and problem solving.

🎮 Hookup to TV and Supports 2 Players - Come with a gamepad and AV Cable, this mini family arcade can be connected to a TV for a better visual and gaming experience, and also supports two players to play together. Such immersive gaming promotes bonding and camaraderie.

🎮 Rechargeable Lithium Battery - Our retro video game console comes with a Li-Ion rechargeable battery, ensuring uninterrupted power source for kids' games. It is also an environmentally friendly choice as it eliminates the need for frequent battery replacement. When fully charged, the console's gaming time is approximately 4 to 6 hours, making it ideal for video game play on the go.

🎮 Absolutely Surprise Gift - This video game console is sure to be a special surprise for your child as a birthday, Christmas, Easter, Thanksgiving gift. Kids and grown ups alike will enjoy and be entertained by it. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, so we can offer you a full refund or free replacement within 60 days. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: 💞Welcome to the CULAGEiMi store.💞Our Vision: Make every childhood better! Our Mission: Bring happiness to every customer! Our store is dedicated to the development of children's toys, the purpose is to be able to make every child happy. Our newly developed game console is a nostalgic style game, which let the kids nowadays experience the joy of the games of the kids in the 80s and 90s. It has 270 built-in unrepeatable classic old-school video games, built-in rechargeable battery, supports AV output to connect to TV, and comes with extra game handles. It allows you to experience the joy of the big screen and also allows you to play with your dear friends or family. 🎁About Gaming: 1. The greatest significance of the game lies in exploring and discovering, so that you can continue to enter the unknown and grow! Enjoy your game process. 2. Some games will be differences in operation, may only have 2 or 3 function keys working. This is not the button fault. 3. When the machine has muted sound, slowed sound, scratched screen or been in dead state, please replace batteries to get optimum performance. 🎁Package includes: 1 X Game console 1 X Gamepad 1 X Rechargeable Lithium Battery 1 X User manual 1 x AV cable 🎁Tips: 1. Please note that it is fully charged before use, which can bring better gaming experience. 2. Any problem can contact us, we are at your service 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice birthday gift.
reviews.reviewText: This mini handheld game console was given to my son as a birthday present.For its price you can’t beat it for the new to gaming or casual gamer. Many many simple and recognizable games all in one hand held.Easy to select games and play.It's rechargeable, which is very convenient and eliminates the need to buy batteries at a CVS or grocery store.Screen is good and lit well. I was surprised the quality of the screen.well worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars SAVE HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS WITH THIS KID FRIENDLY GAMING PAD(an ps5 is too expensive for a 6 year old)
reviews.reviewText: My nephew loves this kids console and by plugging it up to the television his sister can play with him. With an impressive built-in collection of 270 retro video games, this portable gaming system gives endless entertainment keeping busy toddler’s occupied for hours! The rechargeable battery && gamepad enhance the convenience of on-the-go gaming, a fantastic mini arcade toy.The ability to support 2 players brought an social element to the gaming experience, ideal for birthday or Christmas gifts. A simple retro black design with red, blue colors is visually appealing.The variety of games, spanning different genres, ensures there's something for everyone. The rechargeable battery is a great feature, eliminating the need for constant replacements. The inclusion of a gamepad provides more control, gave my nephew an more immersive experience.The support for 2 players adds a fun multiplayer dimension,perfect for social gatherings or family game nights. The compact design allowing gaming enjoyment anywhere.(portable)Whether you're a gaming enthusiast or looking for a nostalgic trip down memory lane, here you go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great entertainment for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Nice mini game console with fun games. I thought that my kids wouldn’t like the old school gaming system and they loved it! My 8 year old and 5 year old play for hours. It’s great that it has the capability of 2 players in many of the games, and it has a nice variety of games. Very fun. Even my husband loved it and played on it for a long time. Good size too and it charges quickly and battery lasts a very long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's no Switch replacement
reviews.reviewText: The games are all very basic and generally the same formula over and over. Sidescrollers, mazes, "mortal Kombat" style fighters, puzzles, etc. There's an overwhelming amount of games that are a lot of, again, the same game mechanics with different looks. Very simple. Materials feel a bit on the cheap side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and entertaining
reviews.reviewText: I have to drop my kids off at my sisters every morning and pick them back up after work for school with my sister living almost 30 minutes from me (it's a large school district!). So I was looking for something that they could use to entertain themselves in the car since they are to young for phones and always wanted to bring there pads and watch mindless tube videos (I hate that!). Plus what would happen is they would then constantly leave the pads in the car and I would have to figure out what to do with them in super hot or super cold days so they didn't get ruined. So when I came across this handheld game system I figured it was worth a try.This is actually pretty cool! It's rechargeable and lasts for a few days on a single charge, so I don't have to deal with cords in the car. There are also a TON of games on this thing, though I will say not all of them are actually super fun or even in English. There is a fewGames on here that I feel like they just added so that they could say they had XX amount of games on it.Now it's a $20-$30 product depending on the day, so your obviously not getting amazing graphics or anything like that. It's more like the very first old school gameboys in terms of visual game quality. But it's still totally usable and my kids actually haven't complained about that at all which was surprising. Overall for the price it's not a bad deal at all! Much cheaper than buying something like a Nintendo switch and expensive games!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful boredom buster!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. With the cold setting in, the kids are already searching for new ways to deal with the boredom of being stuck inside. This will be so helpful and has already provided a lot of entertainment! Lots of games to choose from, many different types of games also! We love that it comes with a controller for 2 player! My daughter loves the blue color and the battery stays charged! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Instructions were not clear
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t like the fact that there were no instructions on how to play games I was able to search for games but couldn’t get pass anything,I felt like I just wasted my money
